frontmatter.title: Thinking, Fast and Slow - Book Review
frontmatter.description: Daniel Kahneman writes the book with a simple goal - Enable the reader to have smarter water cooler conversations. Drawing on his research, spanning decades, he presents an introduction to cognitive psychology and how it applies to a variety of scenarios - from day-to-day life to economic theory.
